description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of art thefts have left the local galleries in disarray. As whispers of a notorious thief resurface, you must navigate through the vibrant streets of three cities, piecing together clues that intertwine art, deception, and a hidden agenda. The trail leads you to a final confrontation in a city where the past and present collide.
